sentences.en: However , the five basic principles set up here on the basis of the theory of information equivalence , are available for translating English malapropism .
sentences.cn: 然而，如果以信息等效理论为基础，我们仍然能提出一些适用于英语误用词翻译的基本原则。

sentences.en: There is a malapropism in his paper.
sentences.cn: 他的文章里有一处被误用的词。

trans.tran_en: an amusing mistake that you make when you use a word that sounds similar to the word you intended to say but means something completely different
